help_text_1: The goal is to mark the numbers so that their sum adds up to the numbers shown in the columns and rows.
help_text_2: Tap once to mark the numbers; tap again to mark numbers as not part of the solution; and tap a third time to unmark them.
help_text_3: Each column and row shows the required sum, besides the sum of the currently marked numbers.
help_text_4: At the top left, it is shown how many numbers are marked and how many must be marked. You must mark the exact amount of numbers to win.
